channel.title: Ultimate PK's Server [317] D Claws + D plate and vesta + statius
channel.description:
Hello everyone I am Aj owner of this server, I am finally releasing this source, it is From project pearl. I have changed the Vengeance Interface it was messed up. I've Added D claw spec.. not hard. Ancients has been changed and much much more. Sorry for no pictures at the moment If you trust me you can download it. i use norton so i belive these's nothing to be afraid of. this was the best server to many people now its for everyone.
Credits - me 20% Person who released project pearl - 80%
DL link - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=OH71Y7XS Client Link - http://uppit.com/v/05GKX3D5
working Clan chat with Join and Leave Chat : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dwP8YcIqzpw&feature=channel_page New Daganoths Cave..http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s1dpiRZhnoU New Full New Magic Tabs (Like Rs)http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lRIZ5P-nekk&feature=channel_page
Things of Ultimate PKs; Also credits to ;faded vision.
*New Easter Event! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcmZJflEGiw *New 3 working lvl tabs (atk,str and def) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=joAC2YCbT4I *New Pvp drop/50% working Reaper on dead: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=776jbwKnnhw
